name: 林志哲
objective: 1.介紹人工智慧，影像處理，物聯網，智慧機器人，工業4.0，CPS等自動化技術。2.自動化系統介紹，並透過PBL教學讓同學了解自動化元件的原理，包含致動器，感測器，控制器，以及微控制器程式設計，最後期末進行移動機器人之專題實作。
schedule:
Week 10 Introduction to Industry 4.0, CPS, AGV, Robot and automatic technologies
Week 11-12  Introduction to micro controllers and Ardunio programming
Week 13-14 Introduction to sensors for automatic systems and PBL experiments
Week 15-16 Introduction to actuators for automatic systems and PBL experiments
Week 17-18 Final project and final report
materials: Modern control technology: components and systems, 2nd edition, Kilian, ISBN 0-7668-2358-X

name: 蕭俊祥
objective: 介紹影像處理、智慧機器人等理論與技術，使學員瞭解程式語言於機器人自動化的應用, 及評估如何使用適當的演算法。
schedule:
Week 1-2:  Introduction to LabVIEW
Week 3: Vision system and digital image processing
Week 4:  Introduction to Lego robot
Week 5-8: Intelligen robot experiments
Week 9: Midterm Exam
